title: From Bean to Cup, Colombian Women Are Taking On the Coffee Patriarchy
description: But limited access to credit and other barriers are still thwarting their full participation in the South American country’s prized industry.
content: But limited access to credit and other barriers are still thwarting their full participation in the South American country’s prized industry.
